ingredients.item: 100g unsalted butter, melted and cooled, plus extra for greasing

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180˚C, gas mark 4. Grease a 20cm x 20cm square baking tin and line with baking parchment. Using electric beaters, cream the butter, sugar and egg together for 2-3 minutes, until pale and thick. Stir in the remaining ingredients.

Spoon the mixture into the tin, levelling the surface. Bake for 45 minutes until crusty, golden and just set. Leave to cool in the tin, then cut into 12 pieces, or serve while still warm, with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, if liked. SF
